posts.text: Hello, my name is WYK, a undergraduate student in Beijing and this is my first official blog on https://colt45-0121.github.io/. As a matter of fact, I once posted several posts here as a test, but now I’ve removed them and this post can be regarded as the very first post that has some actual contents in it. (or maybe not) I have spent my past life of 19 years trying to reach a level, or a status in which I can have access of absolute freedom. Obviously I haven’t found it yet, but I believe that it won’t take me a long time after this.
